derivation: feminine from the same as G3551 (νομή);
strongs_def: pasture, i.e. (the act) feeding (figuratively, spreading of a gangrene), or (the food) pasturage
outline:
1. pasturage, fodder, food
    1. fig. he shall not want the needful supplies for the true life
  2. growth, increase
    1. of evils spreading like a gangrene
    2. of ulcers
    3. of a conflagration
